mapper.select: SELECT userId, ct.quantity, ct.cartNum, ct.option2Num, op1.option2Name, ct.option2Num2, op2.option2Name option2Name2, deliveryFee, itemPoint, mainImage, ct.itemNum, itemName, i.itemPrice + op2.extraPrice itemPrice, i.itemPrice * (NVL(discount,0) * 0.01) disPrice, i.itemPrice * (100-NVL(discount,0)) * 0.01 finalPrice FROM cart ct JOIN item i ON ct.itemNum = i.itemNum JOIN option2 op1 ON ct.option2Num = op1.option2Num LEFT JOIN option2 op2 ON ct.option2Num2 = op2.option2Num WHERE userId = #{userId} ORDER BY ct.cartNum DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE regDate + 15 < SYSDATE
